Articles.Content:
So I made a spotlight. And it works beautifully. But, the light color isn't tweakable. Any idea what I did or didn't do?

-edit-

Ok, nevermind, this was a DUH moment. I don't think it worked like this in earlier versions of unity but with the new 5.1, when you copy a game object it has a tendency to rename them like Spolight (2), Spotlight (3). At some point in making this light, I copied it and forgot to match the lightName in the .cfg to the object name. It worked just fine without it but wasn't tweakable.

Edited July 1, 2015 by Fengist
